name: UniVerse City EARLY ACCESS DEMO
description:
Thank you all for your patience over this time, with recent changes and sudden growth within our community UniVerse BSC Token. We would like to give the investors an opportunity to play and roam throughout UniVerse City,  while the layout is "set in stone" some design aspects will change throughout the build. Performance may vary depending on not only your machine but an internet connection, Final builds will be stand-alone downloadable and have various options for players with all sorts of gaming devices.  To keep our code safe until the launch date all demos will be playable ONLINE via web browser only with no wallet connection required.

Lastly, because this is a demo some glitches may occur causing you to fall through (open spaces) these could be hidden objects not to be released till the launch date or various other actions that may allow this to happen.

Should you need (because of a glitch) or want to just explore open terrain I have given you the power of flight.

Keyboard key [ F ] = Flight

Controls

Keyboard key [ W ] = Up

Keyboard key [ A ] = Left

Keyboard key [ S ] = Down

Keyboard key [ D ] = Right

Keyboard key [ Shift ] = Run

Keyboard key [ Space ] = Jump

Right Click on Mouse = Zoom

Should you want to take a screenshot, we have the code built into the UI which is hidden right now. We kindly ask you to take this approach for screenshots.

While In-Game and Ready for ScreenShot.

Tap the PRINT SCREEN button located just above your arrow pad and (INS, HOME, PAGE UP) actions pad. 

This will save your present screen, now minimize the window or simply open any digital drawing program such as Microsoft Paint.

When your digital drawing program opens goto edit>paste OR  on your keyboard hit CTRL + P .

Add anything else, save and post to the community! 

https://t.me/UniVersebsc
